pesticide.PPE: Coveralls over short-sleeved shirt and short pants; Chemical-resistant gloves (such as Barrier Laminate, Butyl Rubber, Nitrile Rubber, or Viton); Chemical-resistant footwear plus socks; Chemical-resistant headgear for overhead exposure; Chemical-resistant apron when cleaning equipment, mixing, or loading

Safety_Information.general_Info: Causes substantial but temporary eye injury; harmful if swallowed; do not get in eyes or on clothing; wear protective eye wear; wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet; remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse; may cause skin sensitization reactions in some people.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes; remove contact lenses if present after the first 5 minutes and continue rinsing; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice; do not give any liquid to the person; do not induce vomiting unless told by a poison control center or doctor; do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing; rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes; call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Inhaled: Move person to fresh air; if person is not breathing call 911 or an ambulance then give artificial respiration, preferably mouth to mouth; call a poison control center or doctor for further treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: May pose an aspiration pneumonia hazard. Contains petroleum distillates.
